name: Hearts-by-Webfoot
description:
Play the classic card game Hearts on your iPad, iPhone or iPod.

Compete against the computer's AI players for a real challenge. A regular deck of 52 cards is used. The player to the left of the dealer leads first. In Hearts, players must follow suit, but if unable to follow suit, may play any card. A trick is won by the highest card played on the suit led.

This is a face paced playing game. Enjoy a soothing soundtrack and smooth animated gameplay. Includes detailed in-game rules and help. Classic card game fun for all ages!

This game is best played on tablet devices.

Features:

* Real Hearts rules
* Play against the computer AI
* Fast animated play
* Detailed game rules included
* Soothing soundtrack

Compatibility:

* iPhone
* iPod Touch
* iPad
